title: Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog UI suggestions
description:
When pressing 'Add' for the associated editors in the Editor Selection Dialog, there are some UI suggestions:
a. Enable multiple selection.
b. Mark the default entry in the associated editors list as '(default)' (similar to perspectives).

Additional notes:
- KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM): Also, the dialog needs a width hint and why does the File editors Preference page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same?
- KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM): Fixes for a, c, f, and g have been released.
EB: Entries that already exist in the associated editors should not be available for selection.
SR: Make sure that when a user presses 'Add', a hidden entry is not added. Additionally, ensure that entries already existing in the associated editors are not available for selection.
